title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.

title: About
text:
I’m passionate about using data to drive impactful solutions. Data has always intrigued me—how it can inform decisions, drive business strategies, and shape meaningful outcomes.
I’ve worked with clients to understand their business needs, secure funding, and navigate rural and peri-urban markets, always finding fulfillment in the process of research, project management and fieldwork.
Over the years, I’ve applied my skills in sectors like agriculture, renewable energy, and micro-finance, consistently focused on solving real-world problems and fostering growth.
Outside of work, I’m a big music and sports fan, with a particular love for Formula One and football.
